data.actual_result: The dots for some pages are wider than others.
data.expected_result: The dots for each news page should be identical.
data.short_description: When zoomed to small percentages, page dots in game popup have inconsistent width.
data.steps_to_repro: - Zoom to anything less than 90, until you feel like the text is quite small. - Go to Activity. - Click on any game that allows you to click on arrows for 3+ pages of news, such as Minecraft or Payday 2.
